licensesAgree: I herby acknowledge that I have reviewed all the terms and conditions of the regulations of the Centers, Clubs, Service Offices, and Private Sports Enterprises and that I am fully aware of the no-smoking condition at the times and places of practice of authorized sports activities. I also undertake not to circulate dopes, vitamins, and food supplements which contain internationally restricted dopes. In addition, I undertake not to organize or participate in any sports competitions or championships inside or outside UAE unless I get the prior written approval of the Authority and concerned sports federations per each several activities as per Federal Decretal Law No (7) of 2008 regarding the General Authority for Sports and operating agencies.

futureLeaderForm.emiratesIDNumberMaxLenght: Emirates ID Number must be maximum 15 characters long.
futureLeaderForm.introduction: The General Authority of Sports looks forward for the “Emirates Platform for Future Sports Leaders” to live up to its name and offer an integrated and legitimate gateway for talented Emirati professionals looking to join the national sports sector. The Authority is confident the new platform will be a hub for attracting national expertise in various administrative and technical disciplines, enlisting them in sports entities as a first step on their journey towards continental and international federations.
futureLeaderForm.lastDayOfRegistration: Last day of Registration in LQC is Sunday 21 Nov 2021
